attributes.action: make St. Georges Day a Public Holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For many years now, people have said that St. Georges Day should be a public Holiday. Although the government reckons that "The present pattern of bank holidays in the United Kingdom is well established and accepted, and the Government has no current plans to change the arrangements." However, its not about that, its about pride in our country!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
